ok-desc-portfolio: Development of the portfolio in React for the front, Node js for the back with a database for the possibility of modifying theme colors and content using a back office. As well as the complete internationalization of the site.
ok-desc-bataille-navale: Creation of the specifications, design of the database as well as the model of a naval battle game. Game development in Node js with Express for the back, MVC architecture in JS for the front.
ok-desc-mx-ecole: Creation of the specifications, design of the database as well as the layout in collaboration with the company manager. Development of the online registration site for motocross courses and a back office for the creation of courses, access to the list of students on the timetable as well as access to those registered for courses.
